STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> Reminder: Public Safety Technology Seminar TOMORROW: You are registered to attend Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
This is your confirmation that you are registered for the Next Generation Public Safety Technology Seminar. We look forward to seeing you at the seminar.
Date: Wednesday, October 17 Agenda: 10:00 AM - 12:00 NOON Presentation: Next Generation Public Safety and solutions designed to improve the workflow of your communications center
- Unified user experience to interact with and incorporate new types of data such as text, pictures, video and more - Better integration of analysis and mapping with patrol work and fire response - Faster, more efficient call-taking protocols to deliver the right information at the right time. - Streamline false alarm administration and increase fee and fine collections - Reduce overheard IT costs with web-based fire records management - Ergonomic trends for improved personnel health and productivity
12:00 NOON - 1:00 PM Lunch and Learn
1:00 PM - 3:00 PM Interactive Product Demonstrations and Door Prizes
Bonus: Door Prizes, Refreshments and Lunch will be provided.
Address: Alpharetta Microsoft Facility 1125 Sanctuary Parkway, Suite 300 Alpharetta, GA 30009 678-629-5700 Click here for map and directions <http://offers.tritech.com/rs/ortivusna/images/MS Alpharetta directions.pdf>
